verbose_text: However, we showed that in the presence of S1PR1, VEGF markedly increased the phosphorylation of VEGFR2 at Y951, which allowed VEGFR2 to remain on the EC surface to augment Rac1 activity by Tiam1, thereby promoting EC migration and, hence tumor vascularization.
evidence: VEGFR2 at Y951, which allowed VEGFR2 to remain on the EC surface to augment Rac1 activity by Tiam1, thereby promoting EC
